title: Trace Adkins Surprises Listener Who Was Scammed by ‘Fake Trace Adkins’ + Morgan2 Genius Social Media Strategy for Mean Comments + Eddie’s Unusual Way on How He Disciplines One of His Kids
itunes:title: Trace Adkins Surprises Listener Who Was Scammed by ‘Fake Trace Adkins’ + Morgan2 Genius Social Media Strategy for Mean Comments + Eddie’s Unusual Way on How He Disciplines One of His Kids
description:
Last week, listener Alice called in to share her recent terrible situation with a scammer was acting like Trace Adkins and told her they needed over $1,000 for tickets to his show coming up in her city. Morgan2 has a new rule for her personal social media accounts when it comes to blocking people. A listener left a voicemail asking how Eddie disciplines his bio children vs adopted.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
